title: Canada bans cruise ships for a year, taking another Southeast Alaska tourism season off the table
content:
1. Canada bans cruise ships for a year, taking another Southeast Alaska tourism season off the table  Alaska Public Media News
  2. Seattle faces deep financial impacts from Canada's ban on cruise ships until 2022  KING 5
  3. Canada bans cruise ships for another year, likely halting most of Alaska's 2021 tourism season  Anchorage Daily News
  4. For Sitka tourism businesses, the 2021 season is fraught with uncertainty  KCAW
  5. Seattle cruise season again a victim of COVID-19 after Canada extends ban through early 2022  Seattle Times

localize.title: 加拿大禁游轮一年，让阿拉斯加东南旅游季又泡汤了。
